message: Let's start off on a good note. This offer gives me a bit more, but you'll still get a decent amount.

Let's be fair and split this evenly. With inflation affecting both of us (especially me at 20% per round), it's in our mutual interest to reach an agreement soon. This 50-50 split is the fairest solution and allows us both to walk away with a good outcome.
